Overview

Since 2016, CommonCrawl regularly publishes the robots.txt files that were fetched during the CCBotâ€™s web crawl. The robots.txt dumps are published along with the regular WARC, WAT and WET files in intervals of approximately two to three months. We have parsed the last robots.txt dumps of each year since 2016, resulting in eight years of collected statistics. The following table outlines each year together with the period, in which the documents were fetched, as well as the total number of fetches. As the dumps also contain unsuccessful fetches (e.g. HTTP status code 404) and unparsable files, the last column of the table shows the total number of successfully parsed robots.txt files.

Capture times Number of documents
Year Start End Fetched Parsed
2023 Nov 28, 2023 Dec 12, 2023 74300729 41611877 (56.0 %)
2022 Nov 26, 2022 Dec 10, 2022 63477936 37379200 (58.9 %)
2021 Nov 26, 2021 Dec 9, 2021 65995031 38259274 (58.0 %)
2020 Nov 23, 2020 Dec 6, 2020
2019 Dec 5, 2019 Dec 16, 2019
2018
2017
2016
